author: Kimberley Moore
comment: Love it! It's looks so good too! I would love a bb8 version!

reply.author: Reality Labs
reply.content: Thanks for You review, search for Bbot on play store, we have a similar bb8 robot version!

author: Dave Campbell
comment: FANTASTIC  Apart from R2D2 being the coolest droid ever... love this watch face, Looks great and is not a battery drain at all. With the latest update you stepped it upto RAD status for me.  WELL WORTH THE MONEY! #maytheforcebewithyou

reply.author: Reality Labs
reply.content: Thank you for your message, these messages really are the ones that encourage us to go ahead with our work, we hope to bring new designs for other themes very soon. #maytheforcebewithyou Dave!!!

author: Ash B
comment: Love this watchface so far - exactly what I was looking for, and I love looking down to see lil R2-D2. I think it'd be great to add a BB-8 one, especially as their design is already geared around a circle shape!

reply.author: Reality Labs
reply.content: Tanks for your review, search for Bbot on play store, we have a similar robot version!

author: Jim McGregor
comment: Not working on my huawei watch after android wear 2.0 update

reply.author: Reality Labs
reply.content: Please try again, we have just upload a new update.

author: Ryan Bouley
comment: Latest update made the watchface not work. LG Watch Sport.

reply.author: Reality Labs
reply.content: Ryan good day, Can you send us more information about the problem on your watch? We need to know what is the error exactly, if it is possible send us an image we will proceed immediately with the investigation to solve your problem. Our Email is: therealitylabs@gmail.com

author: Roger Culberson
comment: It actually worked on my huawei watch. The dragon radar watch face was a real disappointment but this one worked.

reply.author: Reality Labs
reply.content: Thanks for your rating, we are working to correct the errors of the dragon radar watch face.
